## EB144-240707: Polaris AHU Replacement
**Solicitation Number:** WS4195390979
**Publication Date:** September 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 21, 2023, 14:00:00

### Background Information

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), is seeking Mechanical Engineering Consultant Services for the replacement of air handling units serving each floor of the Polaris building at the Bedford Institute of Oceanography.

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

Upon consultation with participating contractors, PSPC invites these firms to submit proposals in response to the supply arrangement E0225-150564 for Mechanical Engineering Services.

Eligible contractors include:
- Argyll Associates Limited
- M&R Engineering Limited
- exp Services Inc
- SNC-Lavalin Inc

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Contact Information

Grant Stewart, Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Email: stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the RFP, can be found through the PSPC website. Interested vendors are encouraged to review the documents thoroughly before submitting their proposals.

### Post Tender Activity

Unsuccessful bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Vendors should make the request to the contracting authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

### Important Dates

- **Publication Date:** September 6, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** September 21, 2023, 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** September 20, 2023

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
